Date.description: The date and time when the payment was made.

CurrencyRate.description: The currency exchange rate at the time of the payment.

Amount.description: The total amount of the payment.

Reference.description: A reference number or description provided for the payment.

IsReconciled.description: Indicates if the payment has been reconciled with the corresponding invoice.

Status.description: The current status of the payment, e.g., pending, completed, failed.

PaymentType.description: The type of payment, e.g., credit card, bank transfer, etc.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time when the payment record was last updated in UTC timezone.

Account.description: The account associated with the payment.

Invoice.description: Details of the invoice to which the payment is linked.

CreditNote.description: Details related to a credit note applied to the payment.

CreditNoteNumber.description: The number of the credit note associated with the payment.

Prepayments.description: Details of any prepayments applied to the payment.

PrepaymentID.description: The ID of the prepayment associated with the payment.

Overpayment.description: Details related to any overpayments for the payment.

OverpaymentID.description: The ID of the overpayment associated with the payment.

BankAmount.description: The amount received in the bank account after processing fees or currency conversions.

HasValidationErrors.description: Indicates if there are validation errors present for the payment.

PaymentID.description: The unique identifier for the payment.

HasAccount.description: Indicates if the payment has an associated account.

BatchPaymentID.description: The identifier for batch payment if the payment is part of a batch.
